# Base Styles for Infographics

This file defines the default style and theme for generated infographics. Customize these sections according to your needs.

---

## Visual Style

**Main style:** Modern flat design
**Characteristics:**
- Clean and minimalist design
- Simple and recognizable iconography
- No excessive shadows or complex gradients
- Basic geometric shapes
- High contrast for readability

**Style keywords:**
```
flat design, modern, clean, minimalist, professional, vector illustration
```

---

## Color Palette

**Primary colors:**
- Corporate blue (#2563EB)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Dark gray (#1F2937)

**Accent colors:**
- Energetic orange (#F97316)
- Success green (#10B981)
- Alert red (#EF4444)

**Background:**
- Clean white or very light gray (#F9FAFB)

**Color keywords:**
```
blue and white color palette, professional corporate colors, vibrant accents, clean background
```

---

## Theme / Industry

**Sector:** General / Technology
**Tone:** Professional but accessible
**Audience:** General public, professionals

**Thematic elements:**
- Technology icons when applicable
- Business-friendly style
- Adaptable to educational and corporate contexts

---

## Composition

**Preferred layout:** Vertical (portrait)
**Aspect ratio:** 2:3 or 9:16 for social media
**Structure:**
- Prominent title at the top
- Clearly differentiated sections
- Top-to-bottom reading flow
- Strategic white space

**Composition keywords:**
```
vertical layout, organized sections, clear hierarchy, well-structured, readable flow
```

---

## Typography

**Typographic style:**
- Modern sans-serif for titles
- Readable and clean for body text
- Clear hierarchy (title > subtitle > content)

**Characteristics:**
- High contrast with background
- Sizes differentiated by importance
- Avoid more than 2-3 different fonts

---

## Technical Quality

**Resolution:** High resolution, print-ready
**Suggested format:** PNG or SVG
**Specifications:**
```
high resolution, sharp details, print quality, professional finish
```

---

## Elements to Avoid (Negative Prompts)

```
blurry, low quality, pixelated, cluttered, too many colors, hard to read text, 3D realistic, photorealistic, complex gradients, busy background, overlapping elements
```

---

## Complete Base Prompt

Combine all the above elements into a base prompt:

```
Professional infographic, modern flat design style, clean minimalist vector illustration, blue and white corporate color palette with orange accents, vertical layout with organized sections, clear visual hierarchy, readable typography, high resolution print-ready quality, white clean background
```

---

## Customization

### To change to a specific corporate style:
Modify the "Color Palette" section with your brand colors.

### To change the industry/theme:
Modify the "Theme / Industry" section with your specific sector.

### For alternative styles:

**Tech/Startup Style:**
```
tech startup style, gradient backgrounds, neon accents, dark mode option, futuristic icons
```

**Educational Style:**
```
educational friendly style, warm colors, approachable illustrations, cartoon-like icons
```

**Medical/Scientific Style:**
```
medical professional style, clinical clean design, blue and green palette, scientific icons
```

**Creative/Marketing Style:**
```
creative bold style, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, eye-catching design, trendy aesthetics
```
